info.description: This API will return Organizational Supplier information
info.title: Suppliers

tags.name: Supplier
tags.description: This API will return a list of Organizational Supplier information

get.summary: Return a collection of Organizational Supplier information

parameters.name: org_value
parameters.description: Location Code to have Suppliers returned for

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Used to search for a supplier against Name or MSA

parameters.name: enablement_type
parameters.description: User to filter records by Supplier Enablement Type. Multiple entries allowed in a comma separated list

parameters.name: enabled_only
parameters.description: Flag used to determine if the Supplier is Enabled or not

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

parameters.name: smoke
parameters.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

page.description: Page number of the result set

supplier_display_name.description: Conactinated string of MSA and Vendor Name

assignment_start_date.description: Start Date of the Assignment of the Supplier
